title: OpenTelemetry Metrics: Concepts, Types & Instruments
author: Sara Miteva
description: Discover OpenTelemetry Metrics: Understand types, instruments & their role in performance monitoring. Learn best practices & how to get started with Checkly.
cntitle: OpenTelemetry 指标：概念、类型和仪器
cndescription: 探索 OpenTelemetry 指标：了解指标类型、仪器及其在性能监控中的作用。学习最佳实践以及如何开始使用 Checkly。
